page.name: DeathKnight Upgrades
page.description: <no description available>

page.name: Unhallowed DeathKnight Blade IV
page.description: You've enhanced your blade with the power of shadow. While more powerful than it was before, shadows seem to now cling to the blade as you use it. Click to switch between Darkness and Light. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Unhallowed DeathKnight Blade IV
properties.description: You've enhanced your blade with the power of shadow. While more powerful than it was before, shadows seem to now cling to the blade as you use it. Click to switch between Darkness and Light. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Unhallowed DeathKnight Helm IV
page.description: You've infused your helm with shadow energy. The power that it held has been increased, but you now seem to see odd shapes at the edge of your vision. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Unhallowed DeathKnight Helm IV
properties.description: You've infused your helm with shadow energy. The power that it held has been increased, but you now seem to see odd shapes at the edge of your vision. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Unhallowed DeathKnight Cloak IV
page.description: You've infused your cloak with shadow energy. It seems to wrap around you like your own shadow, but it no longer keeps you warm. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Unhallowed DeathKnight Cloak IV
properties.description: You've infused your cloak with shadow energy. It seems to wrap around you like your own shadow, but it no longer keeps you warm. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Unhallowed DeathKnight Belt IV
page.description: You've enhanced your belt with shadow energy. It feels as though you aren't clasping anything around your waist as you put it on. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Unhallowed DeathKnight Belt IV
properties.description: You've enhanced your belt with shadow energy. It feels as though you aren't clasping anything around your waist as you put it on. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Unhallowed DeathKnight Circlet IV
page.description: You've infused this ring with shadow energy. As you move your hand it seems to blur, almost as though it was leaving shadows of itself behind. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Unhallowed DeathKnight Circlet IV
properties.description: You've infused this ring with shadow energy. As you move your hand it seems to blur, almost as though it was leaving shadows of itself behind. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Unhallowed DeathKnight Amulet IV
page.description: You've enhanced your amulet with shadows. Wearing it allows you to make out odd shapes that seem to just barely come into view. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
